text.section: A person is guilty of bribing a juror when he offers, confers or agrees to confer any pecuniary benefit upon a juror with intent to influence the juror's vote, opinion, decision or other action as a juror.
Bribing a juror is a Class D felony.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 205, effective January 1, 1975.
